availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth L. Vance. Veteran of the War of 1812. Farmer in Warren County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No. 2, p. 53. Henry M Vance, War of 1812 Pension Application Files Index, Pension # SO 21685, War of 1812 Pension Applications. Washington D.C.: National Archives. NARA Microfilm Publication M313, Microfilm Roll 94, Records of the Department of Veterans Affairs, Record Group Number 15.
